refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int SSL_SESSION_set1_id(SSL_SESSION *s, const unsigned char *sid, unsigned int sid_len);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_set1_id() sets the the session ID for the ssl SSL/TLS session to sid of length sid_len.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_set1_id() returns 1 for success and 0 for failure, for example if the supplied session ID length exceeds SSL_MAX_SSL_SESSION_ID_LENGTH.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_set1_id() was first added to OpenSSL 1.1.0
